### Read Some Text

```{r echo=FALSE}

paper <- tibble(
  
  title = c("<i>Editorial: Unlearning some of our social scientist habits</i>",
            "<i>What is the difference between evaluation and research - and why do we care?</i>",
            "<i>What Is evaluation?: Perspectives of how evaluation differs (or not) from research</i>"
            ),
  
  Source = c("Davidson, J. (2007)",
             "Mathison, S. (2006)",
             "Wanzer, D.L. (2021)"),
  
  Arrow = c("internal",
            "internal",
            "internal"),
  
  Icon = c("pdf", 
           "pdf",
           "pdf"),
  
  Site = c(
    "https://journals.sfu.ca/jmde/index.php/jmde_1/article/view/68",
    "",
    "https://doi.org/10.1177/1098214020920710"
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
paper %>%
  mutate(Icon = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon`, "slack") ~ '<img src="/logos/slack-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "ecampus") ~ '<img src="/logos/wvu-gold-ico.png" alt="WVU icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "library") ~ '<img src="/logos/library-ico.png" alt="Library icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "journal") ~ '<img src="/logos/journal-ico.png" alt="Journal icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "visualization") ~ '<img src="/logos/dataviz-ico.png" alt="Data Visualization icon" width="26px">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Arrow = case_when(
    str_detect(`Arrow`, "external") ~ '<div style="font-size: 0.5rem;"><i class="fa fa-external-link fa-2x" aria-hidden="true" style="color:#559977"></i></div>',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Site = na_if(Site, "")) %>%
  mutate(Link = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site," target='_blank'>",Icon,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ "Please check this week's download"
    )
  ) %>%
  select(-Icon, -Site, -Arrow) %>% 
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", "Citation", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'llc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "22em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "12em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "8em") %>% 
  row_spec(0:nrow(paper), extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent")
```
</center>
